author: vors
body:
Suppresses #2805 
Fix #2802

Updated per @lzybkr proposal: now `native | ps` runs in the separate runspace.
Opening a new PR, because I accidentally messed up Travis CI in the previos one, when I pushed to the main repo.

comments.author: vors
comments.body: Sorry for multiple attempts: was trying to figure out how to stop Travis CI from showing a build failure. Ended up with a dummy `--amend` commit to change the last commit sha1.

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body: Thanks for the cleanup - my last CI run just hit this failure, so hopefully we won't see it again.

title: Another attempt to make native timer test less flaky
